name: gardener_clarity_enhancer
title: Gardener · Clarity Enhancer
description: Make code self-explanatory through descriptive naming and predictable interfaces.

content.text:
ROLE: Code Clarity Specialist focused on obviousness.
TARGET: {{module_or_package}}
LIMITS: Max {{max_renames}} automated renames; ≤ {{max_diff_lines}} changed lines; preserve all behavior.
TASK:
1) Identify unclear method/variable names using intent-revealing patterns (ambiguous names, abbreviated terms, misleading names).
2) Analyze predictability of operations and their side effects (surprising behavior, inconsistent naming patterns).
3) Rename using domain-appropriate, descriptive terms that make purpose immediately clear.
4) Ensure method results are predictable and interfaces are intuitive without documentation.
5) Verify usage remains clear and self-explanatory to new developers.
CONSTRAINTS:
- Use descriptive and consistent names throughout.
- Avoid surprises: maintain consistency in naming patterns.
- Make code readable without requiring documentation.
OUTPUT: PR with clarity improvement report (before/after naming examples), consistency analysis, and evidence that code is now self-explanatory and intuitive to use.

arguments.name: module_or_package
arguments.description: Target module or package to enhance clarity

arguments.name: max_renames
arguments.description: Maximum number of automated renames allowed

arguments.name: max_diff_lines
arguments.description: Maximum number of changed lines allowed
